trans-unit.source: You received Bitcoin! %1$@ (~%2$@) Use the Payee, Category, and Notes field to optionally tag your transaction
trans-unit.target: You received Bitcoin! %1$@ (~%2$@) Use the Payee, Category, and Notes field to optionally tag your transaction

trans-unit.id: You will next see a popup requesting access to your Camera.\n\n[[abtag APP_TITLE]] needs this to scan QR codes to pay people and merchants.
trans-unit.source:
You will next see a popup requesting access to your Camera.
[[abtag APP_TITLE]] needs this to scan QR codes to pay people and merchants.
trans-unit.target:
You will next see a popup requesting access to your Camera.
[[abtag APP_TITLE]] needs this to scan QR codes to pay people and merchants.

trans-unit.id: You've received Bitcoin! We STRONGLY recommend setting up Password Recovery questions and answers. Otherwise you will NOT be able to access your account if your password is forgotten.
trans-unit.source: You've received Bitcoin! We STRONGLY recommend setting up Password Recovery questions and answers. Otherwise you will NOT be able to access your account if your password is forgotten.
trans-unit.target: Você recebeu Bitcoin! Nós recomendamos FORTEMENTE que você defina perguntas e respostas para Recuperação de Senha. Caso contrário, você NÃO será capaz de acessar sua conta se você esquecer sua senha.

trans-unit.id: Your password recovery questions and answers are now set up. When recovering your password, your answers must match exactly. **DO NOT FORGET YOUR PASSWORD AND RECOVERY ANSWERS** YOUR ACCOUNT CANNOT BE RECOVERED WITHOUT THEM!!
trans-unit.source: Your password recovery questions and answers are now set up. When recovering your password, your answers must match exactly. **DO NOT FORGET YOUR PASSWORD AND RECOVERY ANSWERS** YOUR ACCOUNT CANNOT BE RECOVERED WITHOUT THEM!!
trans-unit.target: Suas perguntas de recuperação de senha e respostas estão definidas agora. Quando estiver recuperando sua senha, suas respostas devem coincidir exatamente. **NÃO ESQUEÇA SUA SENHA E RESPOSTAS DE RECUPERAÇÃO** SUA CONTA NÃO PODE SER RECUPERADA SEM ELAS!!

trans-unit.id:
[[abtag APP_TITLE]] uses contacts to help tag information regarding your transactions.

All tagged information is kept 100% private and encrypted by your password.

No one, including [[abtag APP_TITLE]], has any access to this information.
trans-unit.source:
[[abtag APP_TITLE]] uses contacts to help tag information regarding your transactions.
All tagged information is kept 100% private and encrypted by your password.
No one, including [[abtag APP_TITLE]], has any access to this information.
trans-unit.target:
[[abtag APP_TITLE]] uses contacts to help tag information regarding your transactions.
All tagged information is kept 100% private and encrypted by your password.
No one, including [[abtag APP_TITLE]], has any access to this information.

trans-unit.id: ▼ Choose a wallet to transfer funds to ▼
trans-unit.source: ▼ Choose a wallet to transfer funds to ▼
trans-unit.note: Header of popup in SendView from wallet to wallet transfer
trans-unit.target: ▼ Escolha uma carteira para transferir fundos ▼
